result.title: Confusion in team selection for ACM ICPC INDIA prelims
result.content: Can a member be a part of two different teams? Like Team1: x,y,"ME" and Team2: v,w,"ME" . How will i participate from both the teams at the same time as the online prelims for all the 4 sites are on the same date? Is there a rule that i have to participate in only one team on all the 4 sites .
